pkgmetadata.longdescription: Basic Functions for Supporting an Implementation of Choice Experiments // Provides basic functions that support an implementation of (discrete) choice experiments (CEs). CEs is a question-based survey method measuring people's preferences for goods/services and their characteristics. Refer to Louviere et al. (2000) doi:10.1017/CBO9780511753831 for details on CEs, and Aizaki (2012) doi:10.18637/jss.v050.c02 for the package.
